(It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.") Activated abilities of Illusions you activate cost up to {1} less to activate.

card.name: Ride with the Herd
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Homestead {R}{G} ({R}{G}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Ride Together
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Homestead {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Rugged Outlaw
card.text: Rugged Outlaw enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spinner of Yarns // Tall Tale
card.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Spinner of Yarns gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you cast that spell from a graveyard, instead put a +1/+1 counter on Spinner of Yarns.
---
(Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Woodland Hag-Ape
card.text: When Woodland Hag-Ape enters the battlefield, create a Sighting token. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.") Other Strange creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.

card.name: Solemn Sheriff
card.text: Each other creature you control that's a Bard or Ranger gets +1/+1.

card.name: Forlorn Buggy
card.text: Menace Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Fort Charles Map
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Fort Charles Map: Create a Sighting token. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.")

card.name: Ancient Bones
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Ancient Bones: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {T}: Sacrifice Ancient Bones: Create a Clue token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Waypoint Trophy
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Whenever you tap one or more creatures you control to cast a spell with homestead, count the total power of those creatures as 1 greater.

card.name: Dinosaur Boneyard
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Dinosaur Boneyard: Draw a card.

card.name: Traveling Sideshow
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard, sacrifice Traveling Sideshow: Create an X/X Merfolk artifact creature token named Stitched Exhibit, where X is the combined mana value of the exiled cards.

card.name: Unnatural Color
card.text: Enchant permanent If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy Unnatural Color.

card.name: Mysterious Beacon
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {1} and {T} less to activate.

card.name: Slender Stalker
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Slender Stalker can't be blocked.

card.name: Nix
card.text: Counter target spell if no mana was spent to cast it.

card.name: Peaceful Moment
card.text: You may put a land card from your hand or your graveyard onto the battlefield, then destroy all creatures with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Campfire Troubador // On the Range
card.text:
---
(Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Laying Track
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Homestead {G} ({G}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Lamplit Discovery
card.text: Target player discards two cards. If two noncreature cards are discarded this way, create a Sighting token. (They're 2/2 colorless Illusion creatures with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.")

card.name: Mustang Wrangling
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Homestead {GW} ({GW}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Watch the Skies
card.text: Draw a card. Create a Sighting token. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.")

card.name: Clue XCO
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: The Bane of Fort Charles
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: XCO Draft Archetypes XCO
card.text: {W}{U} EXILE Ponder the infinite sky and track what has been exiled beyond our world. (That creature can't be blocked except by three or more creature or by creatures with beyond.) {U}{B} STRANGE I want to believe, and with powerful Strange spells, you will too. {B}{R} FOLKLORE Remember those who came before you with Folklore spells. {R}{G} HOMESTEAD Use your bigger creatures to carve out a homestead and cast discounted spells. {G}{W} HOMESTEAD Let many work and one and cast homestead spells with multiple creatures. {W}{B} COUNTERS Life is hard on the frontier. Build your resilience with +1/+1 counters. {B}{G} STRANGE Cryptic cryptids and mysterious monsters are your path to victory. {G}{U} SIGHTINGS Chase half-seen visions of the strange and paranormal. {U}{R} FOLKLORE Cast Folklore spells to remember the history of San Xalco {R}{W} RANGERS Gather a posse and circle the wagons; your Ranger creatures will protect the settlement.

card.name: Orflaith, Silent Settler
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 white Human Ranger creature token. [-3]: Reveal an enchantment card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. [-3]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature or enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life."

card.name: Unexplained Lights
card.text: This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a permanent with mana value 3 or less. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Eerie Dawn
card.text: Draw two cards. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Eerie Dawn. Homestead {1}{U}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}{U}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Roll with It
card.text: Choose target creature an opponent controls, then draw a card and reveal it. If the revealed card's mana value is even, that creature's owner puts it on the top of their library. Otherwise, that creature's owner puts it on the bottom of their library.

card.name: Issa, Frontier Sheriff
card.text: Lifelink Whenever a Bard or Ranger you control dies, Issa, Frontier Sheriff deals damage to target opponent equal to that creature's power.

card.name: Unidentified Encounter
card.text: When Unidentified Encounter enters the battlefield, target creature phases out until Unidentified Encounter leaves the battlefield. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.)

card.name: Study the Unknown
card.text: Scry 1, then draw three cards.

card.name: Bones of the Earth
card.text: When Bones of the Earth enters the battlefield, search your library for a card named Soul of Fire or a card named Eternity's Horizon, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells.

card.name: Lone Investigator
card.text: Lone Investigator gets +2/+2 and can't be blocked as long as you've cast a noncreature Strange spell this turn.

card.name: Disputed Sasquatch
card.text: When Disputed Sasquatch enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Prowling Mothman
card.text: Flying Whenever a Strange creature you control dies, create a Sighting token. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.")

card.name: Trail of the Necromancer
card.text: Whenever a player puts a card into their hand from outside the game, put a trace counter on Trail of the Necromancer. Then if it has three or more trace counters on it, you may sacrifice it. When you do, search your library for a legendary creature card or planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Ross Wells, Abductee
card.text: When Ross Wells, Abductee enters the battlefield, create a Sighting token. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.") Whenever you cast a Strange spell, exile Ross Wells. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Midnight Sighting
card.text: When Midnight Sighting enters the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Create a Sighting token and attach Midnight Sighting to it. (It's a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.") Enchanted creature has menace.

card.name: Frightful Gathering // Ghost Story
card.text:
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life.
---
(Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.

card.name: Hideous Chupacabra
card.text: When Hideous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, choose one — • Destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn. • Destroy target Goat.

card.name: Festering Thicket
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Festering Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Rain-Slicked Copse
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) Rain-Slicked Copse enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Cascade Ridge
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Cascade Ridge enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Glittering Massif
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) Glittering Massif enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Grim Horizon
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) Grim Horizon enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Mestin, Tamer of the Wild
card.text: Homestead {R}{W}{B} [+1]: Untap target creature you control. It gets +1/+1 and gains haste and vigilance until end of turn. [-3]: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Untap all nonland permanents you control during each other player's untap step."

card.name: Wilderness Explorer
card.text: When Wilderness Explorer enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value X or less from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Fare Harshly
card.text: Choose one or more — • Exile target artifact. • Exile target creature. • Exile target enchantment. • Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: Trading Tales
card.text: Draw a card for each card type among permanents you control.

card.name: Gathering Storm
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of noncreature spells you've cast this turn. You may exile a noncreature, nonland card with mana value X or less from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Prairie's Promise
card.text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. When you do, copy that spell. Put the other cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Migratory Sasquatch
card.text: Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature you control, create that many Sighting tokens. Do this only once each turn. (They're 2/2 colorless Illusion creatures with "{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.")

card.name: Safety of Home
card.text: Until your next turn, you and up to one target permanent you control gain protection from everything. Exile Safety of Home.

card.name: Evacuation Marshall
card.text: {4}{U}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Evacuation Marshall: Return all creatures to their owners' hands. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Abject Panic
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is the number of card types among cards in exile. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ominous Thunderwing
card.text: Flying, haste Prowess

card.name: Firebrand Rancher
card.text: Firebrand Rancher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each tapped creature you control. Homestead {G}{G} ({G}{G}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Trapper's Provisions
Mud-Feeder Catfish
card.text: When Mud-Feeder Catfish enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of card types among cards in exile. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Muck Scavengers
card.text: {B}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Muck Scavengers and each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Uncaring Environs
card.text: Uncaring Environs deals 3 damage to each creature and 4 damage to each planeswalker.

card.name: Rampaging Relict
card.text: Haste Whenever Rampaging Relict enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Clue token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Peerless Rancher
card.text: Peerless Rancher's power is equal to the total power of other creatures you control that are tapped and not attacking.

card.name: Eldritch Event
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature and a land. Search your library for land card and a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Unnatural Light
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonenchantment permanent unless its controller pays X life.

card.name: Otherworldly Discovery
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may pay any amount of life. If you do, add that much {C} unless any opponent pays an equal amount of life.

card.name: Contemplative Tracker
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put two +1/+1 counters on Contemplative Tracker.

card.name: Manifest Vastness
card.text: Manifest Vastness deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.

card.name: Unexplained Obelisk
card.text: When Unexplained Obelisk enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Unexplained Obelisk: Exile target opponent's graveyard. That player loses 1 life for each card type among cards exiled this way.

card.name: Storm Brewing
card.text: Storm Brewing deals X damage to any target. If this spell was cast for its homestead cost, X is the total power of creatures tapped to cast it. Homestead {R}{R} ({R}{R}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)

card.name: Visions of Elsewhere
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, choose a nonland permanent card at random in your graveyard. If you control no permanents that share a type with it, you may cast that card.

card.name: Cold Light of Day
card.text: Destroy all creatures and all Strange permanents.

card.name: Fruitful Harvest
card.text: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them three nonland cards with mana value 3 or less. You may cast any number of those spells with total mana value 3 or less without paying their mana costs. Then shuffle.

card.name: Stalking Shadow
card.text: Stalking Shadow's power and toughness are each equal to the total number of creature cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

card.name: Moonlit Cell
card.text: If an artifact, creature, or nonbasic land is tapped for mana, it produces {C} instead of any other type and amount. {1}, Tap an untapped land you control: Add one mana of any color. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Inner Vision
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or non-Aura enchantment, except it's an X/X creature, where X is that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Long, Long Weary Day
card.text: Enchant creature you control When Long, Long Weary Day enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Long, Long Weary Day leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Enigmatic Saucer
card.text: Flash Flying When Enigmatic Saucer enters the battlefield, exile target creature or spell. When Enigmatic Saucer leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Charismatic Outlaw
card.text: {B}: Charismatic Outlaw becomes a Human Mercenary with base power and toughness 2/2. {B}{B}: If Charismatic Outlaw is a Mercenary, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {B}{B}{B}: If Charismatic Outlaw's power is four or greater, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Fox, Fort Charles Chronicler // Story of San Xalco
card.text:
You may cast Fox, Fort Charles Chronicler from exile as long as you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
---
(Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Choose target card in a graveyard. You may cast that card this turn.

card.name: Last of the Herd
card.text: Double the power and toughness of target creature you control until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice that creature. When you do, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Prophetic Mothman
card.text: Vigilance, flying; ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Whenever Prophetic Mothman attacks, untap each other creature you control

card.name: Confidence Trickster // Sell the Bridge
card.text:
Vigilance
---
(Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Gain control of target creature.

card.name: Parliament of Rooks
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature card leaves a graveyard for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Parliament of Rooks.

card.name: Dreams of Dragonfire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 4/4, and has flying and haste. It's a Dragon in addition to its other types. You may cast this spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a Clue in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: The Long Way Around
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, put two +1/+1 counters on The Long Way Around. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from The Long Way Around onto creatures you control.

card.name: Abominable Prowler
card.text: When Abominable Prowler enters the battlefield or attacks, put up to one target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Lights in the Dark
card.text: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have "This creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {1} for each creature they control that's blocking it."

card.name: The Fort Charles Devil
card.text: Flash Flying, lifelink At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player discards a card unless they pay 2 life.

card.name: Panning the Stream
card.text: If this spell is the first spell you've cast this turn, add two mana in any combination of colors.

card.name: Settlement Guide
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Harsh Peace
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller may pay {1}. If they don't, you may untap up to one target creature.

card.name: Sighting XCO
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.

card.name: Howling Fiend
card.text: Menace When Howling Fiend enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: A Lonely Place to Die
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {X}, where X is that creature's mana value. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it except it's a Rogue in addition to its other types.

card.name: Disappear in the Dark
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller loses 3 life.

card.name: Trans-Xalco Express
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever it becomes crewed for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Trans-Xalco Express. Crew 2

card.name: Dreams of the Wilderness
card.text: Trample While you're revealing a card you own from outside the game, you may cast Dreams of the Wilderness from outside the game.

card.name: Final Gambit
card.text: Cast this spell only during your declare attackers step. Exile each creature card from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of it that's tapped and attacking. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Loathsome Grunch
card.text: Spells your opponents cast cost an additional 1 life to cast. Abilities your opponents activate that aren't mana abilities cost an additional 1 life to activate.

card.name: Beyond the Sky
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {X}, where X is that spell's mana value. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Cattle Mutilation
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Destroy all creatures with toughness X or less. Then return a creature card with mana value X or less from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: High Plains Drifter
card.text: First strike Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage to an opponent, put that many +1/+1 counters on High Plains Drifter.

card.name: Communion of Spirit
card.text: Choose one. If you cast this spell for its homestead cost, choose any number instead. • Exile target artifact or enchantment. • Create two 1/1 white Human Ranger creature tokens. • You gain 4 life. Homestead {1}{G}{G}{G}
